goals__remit:
NRK Recycling (formerly VKR) is the association of Dutch Plastics Recyclers. 
 
The association promote the economic and environmental responsible collection, sorting and recycling of plastic waste and contribute to improve the image of the recycling industry.  
 
The main objectives are: 
1. Ensure that collection and recycling companies can perform their work in the Netherlands, with minimal administrative burden. 
2. Provide adequate raw materials (waste) for their members; 
3. Provide adequate outlets for the sorted secondary plastic materials, preferably in the Netherlands or Europe; 
4. Promoting the image of our industry and of secondary raw materials.
